JobFullDesc: Business Engineering and Partner Solutions team (BEPS) help businesses build for today and engineer a thriving future through technical expertise and a world-class partner network. By integrating technology and partnerships, we’ll create new opportunities for businesses to build a lasting strategic advantage. Based on a business’s needs our team will connect them with the right partner from our network of experts. We can also consult on a strategic approach to ensure businesses are getting the most out of their partnerships. The Partner Manager, reporting to the Head of Enterprise Cloud, Signal & Integrator Partnerships, will provide ongoing consultative business support to key marketing partners to help grow their businesses while assuring end client success. This role also leads and drives special projects that influence the overall adoption of various FBP technologies and services. You may serve developers building marketing technology integrations across various Facebook APIs with a focus on data signals.
